definition: to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]

sentences.english: It is a time for remembering loved ones who have departed.
sentences.chinese: 在這一天，人們祭弔去世的親人。
